Theme components to adjust to y orientation

Source: R/theme_orientation.R
theme_y_orientation.Rd

Theme components to adjust to y orientation

Usage

theme_y_orientation(
  axis_line_rm = TRUE,
  axis_ticks_rm = TRUE,
  panel_grid_rm = TRUE
)

Arguments

axis_line_rm

TRUE or FALSE of whether to remove the relevant axis line.

axis_ticks_rm

TRUE or FALSE of whether to remove the relevant axis ticks.

panel_grid_rm

TRUE or FALSE of whether to remove the relevant panel grid.

Value

Theme components.

Examples

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(palmerpenguins)

set_blanket()

penguins |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_jitter(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = species)) +
  scale_x_symmetric(penguins, body_mass_g) +
  theme_y_orientation() +
  theme(axis.ticks.y = element_blank()) +
  coord_cartesian(clip = "off") +
  labs(x = "Body mass g", y = "Species")
#> Warning: Removed 2 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
#> (`geom_point()`).
